S04bsu008_u:2_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadīnairañjanātīre sanniṣaṇṇaḥ sārdhamāryāvalokiteśvara
S04bsu008_u:3: bhagavān bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalamālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇo dharmapratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati sañcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati /
S04bsu008_u:4: maṇḍalamālāyāstathāgato maharddhinagarīṃ vārāṇasīṃ gatvā tasyāmāmrapālīvane niṣīdati sma /
S04bsu008_u:5: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivī saṅkampitā sampravedhitā /
S04bsu008_u:6_0: sthitaṃ tatra mahāsiṃhāsanamekaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ saptakarmakṛtaṃ yojanamātramuccamardhayojanamātravistṛtaṃ
S04bsu008_u:8: atha bhagavān siṃhāsanasthito buddhāvataṃsakanāma samādhiṃ pratileme /
S04bsu008_u:10_0: avalokiteśvara tvaṃ mahālokadhātuṃ gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineyasattvānāṃ
S04bsu008_u:10_1: kaṣāyayuktānām aśrāddhānāṃ pāpacaritānāṃ kleśāvṛtānām amātṛjñānāmapitṛjñānām aśrāmaṇyānām
S04bsu008_u:10_2: abrāhmaṇyānāṃ triratnānabhiśrāddhānāṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ ca vajrapāṇiśca dvau maharddhiṃ
S04bsu008_u:10_3: samādhibalaṃ pratipadya asyāṃ maṇḍalamālāyāmabhisaṅkṣipya saṅgrahaṃ kurutam /
S04bsu008_u:11: athāryāvalokiteśvaro vajrapāṇiśca tathāgatasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānavalokya samuttejanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
S04bsu008_u:12: tena samādhibalena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā /
S04bsu008_u:13: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau brahmalokadhātau yāvad rūpalokadhātau tayoḥ kāyāvabhāsaprādurbhāvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu008_u:14: atha tadavabhāsata imāḥ sañcodanā gāthā niścaranti sma /
S04bsu008_u:15: atha tadā kāyāvabhāsaniścaritagāthāvasāne ekaikaṃ pāramparyeṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvā vijñāpitāḥ samuttejivāḥ /
S04bsu008_u:16: te sarve sattvā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ parityajya samyagadṛṣṭiyuktā abhūvan /
S04bsu008_u:18: ye kāmarāgānucaritāḥ pramattāste prāṇātipātādattādānakāmeṣu mithyācārādyaṣṭākuśaladharmebhyo nivṛttāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge sthāpitāḥ /
S04bsu008_u:21: atha sarve te yena mahānagaryayāṃ vārāṇasyām āmrapālīvanaṃ tenopasaṅkramya tathāgatānāmavaropitakuśalamūlapuṇyatejasā tathāgatasyopari puṣpavargamabhiprāvarṣan /
S04bsu008_u:22: atha tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālīvanaṃ samantataḥ niyutaśatasahasrayojanavistīrṇamadhyatiṣṭhat (BuBal 177.18)
S04bsu008_u:23: samaṃ pāṇitalamiva ca divyaṃ manoramaṃ varṇopetam /
S04bsu008_u:27: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiśca samādhervyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu008_u:32: evameva bahavo bho jinaputrāstathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ sattvaparipākāya yathāśayānāṃ yathā vainayikakuśalamūlādhigatānāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cariṃ jñātvā dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu008_u:33_0: kecit sattvā bodhisattvavaineyāḥ kecicchrāvakavaineyāḥ kecit pratyekabuddhavaineyāḥ
S04bsu008_u:33_1: kecid devavaineyāḥ kecit śakravaineyāḥ kecid brahmavaineyāḥ kecinnāgavaineyāḥ kecinmahardhikavaineyāḥ
S04bsu008_u:33_2: kecidrājavaineyāḥ kecit samādhivaineyāḥ kecid dharmaśravaṇavaineyāḥ kecit prātihāryavaineyāḥ
S04bsu008_u:36: dharmāṇāmapi ca bho jinaputrā nāsti tathāgatānāṃ kiñcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā /
S04bsu008_u:48: tadyathā bho jinaputrā vaidyaḥ suśikṣitaḥ sarvāṣṭāṅgāyurvedamupagataḥ sarvadhātukauśalyasarvadravyopakaraṇaprayogābhiyuktaḥ sattvānāṃ nānāvyādhiśarīraparipīḍitānāṃ dhātuṃ jānāti /
S04bsu008_u:53: rudhiram āmajaṃ gulmikaṃ jalodaraṃ hṛdarogaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kaṇḍūṃ dadruṃ piṭakādīn viṣavaisarpādīn jānāti /
S04bsu008_u:54_0: sa sarvaṃ jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravyauṣadhāni prayojya vamanavirecanacūrṇayoganastukarmasīrābandhanadhṛtatailabālacūrṇayogena
S04bsu008_u:61: tadyathāpi kulaputrāḥ candramaṇḍalamupāyākauśalya samanvāgataṃ yathādhātukuśalamūlavaineyān sattvānāmarthāya ātmānamantarhitaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu008_u:67: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ nānāduḥkhāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātuvaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ mārgacaryākauśalyaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu008_u:78: atha tasmin samaye keṣāñcidalpabuddhīnāṃ devaputrāṇām etadabhavat /
S04bsu008_u:79: kimayaṃ tathāgataḥ kṣiprameva parinirvāṇadhātau praveṣṭumicchatīti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan /
S04bsu008_u:83_2: tathāyamanena tathāgatena sarve tathāgatakṛtyaṃ nādyāpi kṛtam /
S04bsu008_u:84: tasmāt śokavyatikramaṇaṃ saṃvarṇayatīti cintayitvā te tūṣṇīmabhūvan /
S04bsu008_u:85: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtasteṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cittamājñāya tān devaputrānetadavocat /
S04bsu008_u:86: devaputrā mā evaṃ cintayata mā pravyāharata /
S04bsu008_u:89: yathā mayā devaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatopāyakauśalyam ṛddhivikurvāṇaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāhaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu008_u:90: mā hi eva tathāgato buddhabalādhānaprātihāryaṃ nāma mahāsūtrarājaṃ prakāśayitukāmo 'tireka kartukāmaḥ /
S04bsu008_u:91: api ca devaputrā na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
S04bsu008_u:95: api ca upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayanti /
S04bsu008_u:98_0: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇavaineyaḥ dhātuvaineyaḥ kaṣāyikajātīyaḥ tathāgate
S04bsu008_u:98_1: aśraddadhānatām aguruśuśrūṣitāṃ gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati
S04bsu008_u:101: candramaṇḍalaṃ yathā rocate tathā tadā tathāgatā loka utpadyante bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya /
S04bsu008_u:102: yāvaddevānāṃ ca munuṣyāṇāṃ ca triratnoddayotanāya sphuṭanāya na ca tathāgatānāṃ jātiḥ saṃvidyate /
S04bsu008_u:103_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ ādarśamaṇḍale sumṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante dṛśyaṃ na
S04bsu008_u:103_1: saṃvidyate na tatrāgamo dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya evameva devaputrāḥ tathāgatakāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu008_u:104_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrā māyakāraḥsuśikṣitaḥ nānānagaratoraṇodyānāṃ nānārathāṃ
S04bsu008_u:104_1: cakravartirūpāṃ nānāratikrīḍāṃ darśayitvā antardhāpayati na ca tasyāḥ krāntirdṛśyate
S04bsu008_u:104_2: na āgamo na nirgamaḥ evameva tathāgatānāmutapādaparinirvāṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu008_u:105_0: api ca devaputrāḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā api kalpaparinirvṛtā api
S04bsu008_u:106: nānālokadhātuvyavasthitā api mokṣayanti sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇadurgativinipātebhyaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ yāvadanupūrveṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhyate /
S04bsu008_u:107: kaḥ punarvādo ye tathāgatān pratyakṣapūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandhapuṣpamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇaiḥ /
S04bsu008_u:108_0: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecit sattvā varṣaśatasahasrakalpakoṭīparinirvṛtān prāñjalibhūtān
S04bsu008_u:108_1: ekavārān nāmadheyaṃ grahīṣyanti 'namo buddhāyeti ' kṛtvā puṣpamākāśe kṣepasyanti
S04bsu008_u:109_0: tiṣṭhatvākāśe puṣpaṃ ye kecit sattvāḥ anuśikṣamāṇāstathāgatapūjārthāya ekatathāgataśikṣāmapi
S04bsu008_u:110_0: ye ca tathāgatapūjāyāṃ diśyasikanāma....vāpi hāsyalāsyabālaratikrīḍanakameva kārayiṣyanti
S04bsu008_u:110_1: sarve te duḥkhasyāntaṃ kṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhiṣyanti kaḥ punarvādo
S04bsu008_u:110_2: ye dhātustūpaṃ dhātupratimāṃ vā kṛtvā sarvasattvadayāparajñāḥ 'sarvasattvān duḥkhebhyaḥ
